title: Garden Tools Recall
description: Can you identify common garden tools and recall their uses? Put your green-thumb knowledge to the test!

questions.question: Which garden tool has a long handle and flat, fan-shaped head used for gathering leaves?
What is a garden trowel primarily used for?
Which tool is used to cut back overgrown branches and shape hedges?
What garden tool has a flat blade on a long handle used to chop weeds and break up soil?
Which tool features curved blades that bypass each other, used for cutting stems and small branches?
What is a garden fork best suited for?
options: Turning and aerating soil and compost

questions.question: Which garden tool is a cylindrical container with a perforated spout for watering plants?
What is a wheelbarrow used for in gardening?
options: Transporting soil, mulch, and garden waste

questions.question: Which tool resembles large, heavy-duty scissors and is used for cutting thick branches?
What is a dibber (or dibble) used for?
options: Making holes in soil for planting seeds or bulbs

questions.question: Which tool has a curved, serrated blade on a pole for cutting high tree branches?
What is a garden edger used for?
options: Creating clean borders between lawn and garden beds

questions.question: Which garden tool has multiple curved tines and is used to loosen and aerate topsoil?
What is a broadcast spreader used for in lawn care?
Which tool is a flat-bladed digging tool with a straight edge, often confused with a shovel?
